title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Open the StyledText component.
2. Enable word wrap mode.
3. Append N lines of text to the component.
4. Observe that the entire client area is redrawn N times.

To confirm the redraws, add the following line of code to the performPaint function in StyledText: 
System.out.println("lineCount " + lineCount + ", paintY " + paintY + ", renderHeight " + renderHeight);
